text: A stab-proof vest (or Stab vest) is a type of body armor that is used by police officers or prison guards to protect them from attacks using knives (or other sharp objects). == Other websites == * New Zealand Herald - Councils fight violence with stab vests * Image of a stab vest to be worn under outer clothing * Image and Technical Information about Stab Proof Vests * Video of Stab Proof Vest Demonstration Category:Protective clothing
title: Stab proof vest
